title: World Protocol
text: A shared, modular game database that supercharges all ICP game worlds with cross-world economies and composable game state.
label: Standard

title: Game Launcher
text: Comprehensive platform for creating games and smart contracts on ICP, no coding necessary.
label: Tool

title: Unity Template
text: Streamlined, ready-to-deploy templates designed for seamless integration of Unity game clients and World canisters to the World Protocol, facilitating rapid game development.
label: Template

title: ICP.NET Library
text: A powerful library to make native calls to ICP canister smart contracts directly from the Unity game engine.
label: Tool

title: World Template
text: A template for the <q>server backend</q> of a game, regulating the logic and rules governing the game economy.
label: Template

title: Code Examples
text: Motoko coding samples of game features like chat, multiplayer simulation, batch transferring tokens & NFTs etc.
label: Tool
